main event: A bright light object was sighted traveling from north to south over the Gulf of Mexico on March 9, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting happened during a calm sea with a visible moon., The object appeared as a bright light with a trail., Three witnesses observed the object from a Coast Guard cutter., The object was noted to be at an altitude of 43 degrees., It was initially thought to possibly be a meteor but did not resemble usual meteors.
sighted object: a bright light with a trail
location: Gulf of Mexico, Gulf of Mexico, USA
witness description: crew members from a U.S. Coast Guard cutter
